TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in NORP , GPE - GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by PERSON , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant is a former serviceman of ORG - GPE . He instituted civil proceedings against ORG to recover the remuneration for his participation in military operations .

On DATE ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) granted his claim . The court awarded the applicant MONEY ( RUR ) . The judgment was not appealed against and acquired legal force on DATE . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution .
On DATE the judgment of DATE was fully enforced .

By a decision of DATE ORG granted the applicant ’s action for compensation of inflation losses sustained as a result of the delayed enforcement of the judgment of DATE . The court acknowledged that the judgment of DATE had been enforced with a substantial delay and awarded the applicant PERSON . No appeal was lodged against the decision and it entered into force on DATE .
On DATE the applicant received the amounts awarded to him by the decision of CARDINAL DATE .
